name: Blood Moon Dicing
description:
Blood Moon. Skybase Delta is being overrun by monsters. 
Repel them with the Dice of Fate.

You play a dice-mage at blood moon. Enemys are infiltrating Skybase Delta and you are the one who is in the wrong place at the wrong time. Throw Dice at these foes, but remember the top most dice of your spell-ring have to match a number above the head of the enemy.

Controls :

Move with WASD, look with mouse
Fire Dice with left mouse button at your enemys, but watch out the numbers
have to match.
